name: @dex4er/ts-node-github-api-example
description: Example of Github API v4 client written in Typescript with Apollo library
author: Piotr Roszatycki

scripts.clean:compile: yarn clean:compile:d.ts && yarn clean:compile:js && yarn clean:compile:js.map
scripts.clean:compile:d.ts: shx rm -f bin/*.d.ts lib/*.d.ts operations/*.d.ts schema/*.d.ts
scripts.clean:compile:js: shx rm -f bin/*.js lib/*.js operations/*.js schema/*.js
scripts.clean:compile:js.map: shx rm -f bin/*.js.map lib/*.js.map operations/*.js.map schema/*.js.map
scripts.compile: yarn codegen && tsc --pretty --project . && tsc --pretty --project bin && shx sed -i "s/env ts-node/env node/" bin/*.js > sed.tmp && shx rm -f sed.tmp
scripts.lint: tsc --noEmit --pretty --project . && tsc --noEmit --pretty --project bin && prettier --ignore-path .gitignore --list-different "**/*.{json,md,ts,yml}" "!**/*.d.ts" && tslint --format stylish --project . && tslint --format stylish --project bin && markdownlint "*.md"
scripts.postpublish: git tag v$npm_package_version -a -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && git push --tags
